transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hello, this is John from ABC Collections. Am I speaking with Mr. Johnson?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance of $500 with XYZ Bank. Are you able to make a payment today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I've been having some financial difficulties lately. Can we work out a payment plan?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: We can certainly discuss payment plan options. Would you be able to make an initial payment of $100 today?
